buffs.name: STATUS_GLASS_SHARDS_NAME
buffs.description_localised: While it is in effect, any characters that use a melee attack will take damage from the Glass Shards on the battlefield.

buffs.name: STATUS_COATING_BEAST_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

buffs.name: STATUS_AP_BOOST_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Characters with AP Boost gain 1 extra AP each round.

buffs.name: STATUS_MULTITARGET_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Attacks from characters with Multitarget target the whole team.

buffs.name: STATUS_AP_DRAIN_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Characters with AP Drain gain 1 fewer AP each round.

buffs.name: STATUS_RESONANCE_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Each time Resonance is inflicted on a character it adds to a counter. When the counter reaches 3, the character is shaken apart and instantly defeated.

buffs.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

buffs.name: STATUS_UNITARGET_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Attacks from characters with Unitarget that normally target a whole team only affect a single target, and attacks that are normally single-target have reduced accuracy.

buffs.name: STATUS_COATING_EARTH_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Coatings change the elemental type of a character for a certain number of turns.

buffs.name: STATUS_WALL_NAME
buffs.description_localised: Walls absorb a certain number of incoming hits. Type-advantaged attacks immediately break walls.

buffs.description_localised: A character that flinches skips its next turn.
